Spencer.Action: Looks right, then left, up the bayou, swings his rifle onto his shoulder and takes a reading from the compass carefully shielding the dial from the sun.
Snaps the compass closed, tucks it away, wipes sweat from his face, gives an arm and hand signal to those behind, holds his rifle ready, and wades confidently across the bayou.
